forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers possible. Low -7C.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of snow showers overnight. Lows overnight in the upper teens.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will become more widely scattered overnight. Low -7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low 18F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with snow likely in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with snow likely in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 28F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will taper to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with periods of light rain and snow developing later in the day. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of mixed winter precipitation. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 23F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.
